name: Imagine® Fashion Life
description: Offers in-game purchases Play three fabulous fashion careers: trendy designer, glamorous top model, or successful mall owner! -Designer: Create original outfits, your own brand, and organize fashion shows! -Top Model: Pose for glamorous photo shoots and set the catwalks on fire with your perfect runway walk. -Mall Mananger: Open and arrange stores, decorate the mall, promote the trendiest cosmetics and fashion brands in stores, and manage your budget to create a world-class mall! Even open new stores abroad! Keep up with the latest trends: -Choose from all the latest fashions. -Get new missions depending on your profile and other player’s profiles that you pass via StreetPass™. For example, a Top Model player could be asked to wear a Designer player’s brand for a fashion show! -Be a social butterfly and stay connected with friends: manage the contacts in your Fashion Book and keep in touch with them to be successful.
